attributes.action: encourage Channel 4 and Endemol Productions to comment on and condemn the apparent racist abuse and bullying occurring in the Big Brother House on Celebrity Big Brother.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those who have been following the media this week cannot fail to know about the debate erupting around the apparent racist abuse aimed at Shilpa Shetty, by fellow housemate Jade Goody.
To date, Channel 4 have only raised the issue of possible racism with the housemates, just once, after Jade Goody referred to Shilpa Shetty as 'Shilpa Popadom'. This lack of action isn't acceptable - Channel 4 need to reflect their role as a public service broadcaster, and stand up in defence of other cultures and in the defence and encouragement of tolerance.
Even if the abuse is determined not to be racist - the act of bullying is to be deplored also, and should be condemned just as strongly.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
